package.name: mbf_gridmap_core
package.description: This package provides common interfaces for navigation specific robot actions. Similarly to the mbf_costmap_core, it contains the GridMapPlanner, GridMapController and GridMapRecovery interfaces. The interfaces have to be implemented by the plugins to make them available for Move Base Flex using the mbf_gridmap_nav navigation implementation. That implementation inherits the mbf_abstract_nav implementation and binds the system to a local and a global costmap.
package.author: Karan Narula
